# Safe configuration file with no secrets
# This file should not trigger any detections

# Application settings
APP_NAME=MyApplication
APP_VERSION=1.0.0
DEBUG=false

# Database configuration (no actual credentials)
DB_HOST=localhost
DB_PORT=5432
DB_NAME=myapp_db
DB_USER=app_user

# API settings
API_URL=https://api.example.com
API_TIMEOUT=30
API_RETRIES=3

# Feature flags
FEATURE_NEW_UI=true
FEATURE_BETA=false

# Logging
LOG_LEVEL=INFO
LOG_FORMAT=json

# Normal looking strings that should not trigger entropy detection
USERNAME=john_doe
EMAIL=user@example.com
DESCRIPTION=This is a normal configuration value

# Numbers and simple values
MAX_CONNECTIONS=100
CACHE_TTL=3600
RATE_LIMIT=1000
